description: Second sheet of the 2022 CalGreen Residential Mandatory Measures checklist (July 2024 Supplement). Covers pollutant control with VOC limit tables for adhesives, sealants, and formaldehyde. Includes indoor air quality and exhaust requirements, carpet/flooring/composite wood/insulation VOC standards, interior moisture control, and installer/inspector qualification requirements.
key_content: 2022 CalGreen Residential Mandatory Measures, Sheet 2 (July 2024 Supplement)
Table 4.504.1 — Adhesive VOC Limits: indoor carpet 50 g/L, wood flooring 100 g/L, multipurpose construction 70 g/L, contact adhesive 80 g/L
Table 4.504.2 — Sealant VOC Limits: sealants 250 g/L, porous primers 775 g/L
Table 4.504.5 — Formaldehyde Limits: hardwood plywood 0.05 ppm, particleboard 0.09 ppm, MDF 0.11 ppm, thin MDF 0.13 ppm
4.505 Indoor air quality: bathroom exhaust fans ENERGY STAR rated, ducted to exterior
4.504.1 Protection of mechanical equipment during construction
4.506.3 Composite wood: CARB ATCM formaldehyde compliance
4.506.5 Moisture content of building materials — limits before enclosure
4.507.1 Concrete slab foundations: vapor retarder required
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: specific checkbox completion status for many items
NOT SHOWN: specific exhaust fan CFM ratings (referenced but values not listed on this sheet)
